attributes.review: This app, like our Cheeto, I mean, “president” is terrible. Doesn’t work, doesn’t help anybody, and is frankly a waste of space. Save your time and energy and don’t install it. But, to be honest, this app is a lot like his promises. It’s broken, doesn’t live up to its potential, and quite frankly, a nuisance.
